Looks like the issue is the format of the URL in the test:
"http:/download.oracle.com/javase/6/docs/api/"
Note we have :/ instead of :// before the host. This should be corrected. Will also see if we can fail more gracefully.

(In reply to Jayaprakash Arthanareeswaran from comment #1) > Looks like the issue is the format of the URL in the test: > > "http:/download.oracle.com/javase/6/docs/api/" > > Note we have :/ instead of :// before the host. This should be corrected. > Will also see if we can fail more gracefully.
Sorry, that incorrect value is intentional. Need to take a closer look

I will release a fix shortly to increase the scope of the try/catch block that look for IAE and NPE.
Let's remind ourselves to run the relevant tests before releasing, please.

http://git.eclipse.org/c/jdt/eclipse.jdt.core.git/commit/?id=f2a8db55d9c2a91376afbcc21d15536fa997b8eb
